snippet: Seven former Illinois women’s basketball players accused Coach Matt Bollant and the former assistant Mike Divilbiss of violating their civil rights by creating a racially hostile environment.
abstract: Seven former Illinois women's basketball players file lawsuit against coach Matt Bollant and former assistant Mike Divilbiss for allegedly creating racially hostile environment.
lead_paragraph: Seven former Illinois women’s basketball players accused Coach Matt Bollant and the former assistant Mike Divilbiss of violating their civil rights by creating a racially hostile environment.

headline.main: Ex-Players Allege Racial Bias at Illinois
headline.print_headline: Ex-Players Allege Racial Bias at Illinois
